com.matrixone.apps.domain.util
Class PropertyUtil

java.lang.Object
  com.matrixone.apps.domain.util.PropertyUtil

public class PropertyUtil
extends java.lang.Object

The PropertyUtil class contains static methods that can be used to access properties from beans or JPOs.

Version:
AEF 9.5.1.0 - Copyright (c) 2002, MatrixOne, Inc.

getSchemaProperty

public static java.lang.String getSchemaProperty(java.lang.String property)

Parameters:

Returns:
the business object schema name

getSchemaProperty

public static java.lang.String getSchemaProperty(java.lang.String type,
                                                 java.lang.String name,
                                                 java.lang.String property)
Deprecated. use the version that takes a context argument

Get the schema property of an administrative object. The property must be on the admin object.

Parameters:
type - the business administrative type; e.g. policy, type, etc.
name - the business administrative name.
property - the property alias name to retrieve.
Returns:
the administrative object property value.
Since:
AEF 9.5.1.0

loadSymbolicNamesCache

public static void loadSymbolicNamesCache(Context context)
                                   throws FrameworkException
Load the static Hashtable with Schema Property values The properties must be on an admin object. This function will load the cache, if the _cachePropertyLoaded is false

Parameters:
context - the eMatrix Context object
Throws:
FrameworkException - if the operation fails
Since:
AEF 10.0.0.0

loadSymbolicNamesCache

public static void loadSymbolicNamesCache(Context context,
                                          boolean forceCacheLoading)
                                   throws FrameworkException
Load the static Hashtable with Schema Property values The properties must be on an admin object. This function will load the cache, if the _cachePropertyLoaded is false or forceCacheLoading is true

Parameters:
context - the eMatrix Context object
forceCacheLoading - boolean to force the cache loading (true - forces loading)
Throws:
FrameworkException - if the operation fails
Since:
AEF 10.5

Returns:
size of hashtable
